definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
pitfall/trap/to get stuck/to sink/to cave in/to frame (false charge)/to capture (a city in battle)/to fall (to the enemy)/defect

sentences.english: The earthquake makes the wall sink and start to crumble.
sentences.chinese: 这次地震把这堵墙震得下陷并开始崩塌。

sentences.english: The back is straight, very strongly developed without sag or roach, and relatively short.
sentences.chinese: 后背直，非常稳固，没有下陷或拱起。

sentences.english: The ground squelches and sinks as it bears my weight , having soaked up plenty.
sentences.chinese: 吸饱雨水的地面，承受着我的体重微微下陷。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the cart continued to sink slowly. Father Fauchelevent rattled in the throat, and shrieked
sentences.chinese: 那时，那辆车慢慢地继续往下陷。

sentences.english: In general, seamounts have wider bottoms and steep sides with flat or collapsed tops.
sentences.chinese: 通常，海山底部较宽且山壁陡峭，山顶或平坦或下陷。

sentences.english: Which of the following has caused parts of Mexico City to sink?
sentences.chinese: 下列哪个原因已经造成墨西哥城部分地区的下陷？

sentences.english: In the meantime, the region continues to lose minute but measurable ground to the Gulf of Mexico every month.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，该地区每个月都在墨西哥湾中一点点下陷。

sentences.english: The backline slopes very slightly toward a gently rounded croup, and is free from sagging or rumpiness.
sentences.chinese: 背线非常轻微地向圆圆的臀部倾斜，没有下陷或褶皱。

sentences.english: Tom’s flat was a kip, and the bed sagged badly in the middle.
sentences.chinese: Tom的家只有一张中间严重下陷的小床。

sentences.english: Overexploiting underground water will cause land subsidence.
sentences.chinese: 过分的开采地下水，会造成地面下陷。

sentences.english: How can a building sink into the ground?
sentences.chinese: 建物如何才会下陷地里？

sentences.english: The MTRC also operates the Airport Railway.
sentences.chinese: 这条铁路因土地下陷而停止运营。

sentences.english: The side of the building has caved in.
sentences.chinese: 这栋建筑物的一侧已下陷了。

sentences.english: The strength- sapping mud always causes several of the competitors to drop out of the race.
sentences.chinese: 让人不断下陷的沼泽地迫使数名选手放弃了比赛。

definition: to rupture/to burst open/to break up
Shenkeng township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
subsidence/caving in/fig. stranded/lost (in contemplation, daydreams etc)
